page.title: 06Cornish Customs
page.content: One of our Cornish customs is the Helston Flora.Helston is a pretty little town and every year they decorate the streets and the ladies dress up in their nicest dresses and the men wear tail coats and top hats then they dance through the streets accompanied by brass bands playing the Furry Dance.There are several dances during the day and they go all through the streets.The children,s dance is usually held in the morning and the grown ups later on.Thousands of people come to watch the dancers and there is a fair held at the same time in another part of the town where there are amusements and stalls selling lots of different things from clothes to crockery.In 1982 the song about the Flora was in the Top Ten when it was sung by Terry Wogan.
